title: Lancer Paragon Sylas
body:
Hello !
I found an interesting visual bug on Sylas, when there's a Lancer Paragon Blitzcrank in the game.

When you steal the ultimate of Lancer Paragon BC, this is what happen with Sylas :
https://i.imgur.com/PeuI6sk.jpg[]

Here are the step to reproduce the bug :
1: Get Sylas, an enemy Lancer Paragon Blitzcrank and your ultimate.
2: Steal the BC's ultimate

It's just visual, and disappear after using the ultimate, but as i don't know if it's a bug or no, i prefer report it.
